prompt: How do I view my account balance and financial summary? ->
completion: To view your account balance and financial summary, navigate to the 'Dashboard' section. Here, you can see an overview of your accounts, transactions, bills, budgets, goals, and other key financial metrics.

prompt: How can I add my bank account to the app? ->
completion: To add your bank account, go to the 'Account' section and click on 'Add Account.' Follow the prompts to enter your bank's name, and any required descriptions. Once completed, your account will be added to the app.

prompt: How do I create a new checking account? ->
completion: To create a new checking account, go to the 'Settings' section and click on 'Add Account.' Select 'Checking' as the account type, then enter the necessary details such as the account name and initial balance. Save the account to start tracking your transactions.

prompt: How do I create a new savings account? ->
completion: To create a new savings account, go to the 'Settings' section and click on 'Add Account.' Select 'Savings' as the account type, then enter the necessary details such as the account name and initial balance. Save the account to start tracking your transactions.

prompt: How do I create a new credit card account? ->
completion: To create a new credit card account, go to the 'Settings' section and click on 'Add Account.' Select 'Credit Card' as the account type, then enter the necessary details such as the account name, initial balance, and credit limit. Save the account to start tracking your transactions.

prompt: Can I add multiple accounts to the app? ->
completion: Yes, you can add multiple accounts to the app. To add a new account, go to the 'Account' section and click on 'Add Account.' Follow the prompts to enter your account details. Once added, you can switch between accounts by selecting the desired account from the account list.

prompt: Can I import transactions from my bank? ->
completion: No, currently you can't import transactions from your bank by linking your bank account to the app. However, you can add a bank account by navigating to the 'Settings' section and click on 'Add Account.' Follow the prompts to add your bank account.

prompt: How do I transfer money between accounts within the app? ->
completion: To transfer money between accounts within the app, go to the 'Transaction' section and click on 'Add Transaction.' Choose the 'Transfer' transaction type, then select the source account and target account. Enter the transfer amount and any additional details, then save the transaction.

prompt: How do I record a new transaction? ->
completion: To record a new transaction, navigate to the 'Transaction' section and click on 'Add Transaction.' Enter the details, including date, amount, category, and description, then save the transaction to update your records.

prompt: Can I set up recurring transactions? ->
completion: Yes, you can set up recurring transactions in the app. To do this, go to the 'Transaction' section and click on 'Add Transaction.' Choose the transaction type and enter the details. Before saving, select the 'Recurring' option and set the frequency (e.g., weekly, monthly). Save the transaction to create the recurring entry.

prompt: How can I view my transaction history? ->
completion: To view your transaction history, go to the 'Transaction' section. Here, you can see a list of all your recorded transactions.

prompt: How do I delete a transaction? ->
completion: To delete a transaction, go to the 'Transaction' section and find the transaction you want to remove. Click on the transaction, then select 'Delete' or 'Remove' from the available options. Confirm your decision to delete the transaction from your records.

prompt: How do I categorize a transaction? ->
completion: To categorize a transaction, go to the 'Transaction' section and select the transaction you want to categorize. Click on the transaction and select 'Categorize.' Choose the appropriate category and any subcategory for the transaction, then save the categorized transaction to update your records.

prompt: How can I view my expenses? ->
completion: To track your expenses, go to the 'Transaction' section to to view your expenses.

prompt: How can I view a summary of my expenses for a specific time period? ->
completion: To view a summary of your expenses for a specific time period, go to the 'Transaction' section and view the 'Expenses' widget. Click on the widget and select the time period you want to view the expenses for. Here, you can see a summary of your expenses for the selected time period.

prompt: How can I track my spending habits over time? ->
completion: To track your spending habits, navigate to the 'Dashboard' or 'Transaction' section. Here, you can view graphs and charts displaying your spending trends, such as monthly expenses, category breakdowns, and comparisons with previous periods.

prompt: How can I create a budget? ->
completion: To create a budget, go to the 'Budget' section and click on 'Add Budget.' Enter the amount you want to allocate for each expense category, and set the start and end dates for the budget period. Save the budget to begin tracking your progress.

prompt: How can I create a monthly budget? ->
completion: To create a monthly budget, go to the 'Budget' section and click on 'Add Budget.' Enter the amount you want to allocate for each expense category, and set the start and end dates for the budget period. Save the budget to begin tracking your progress.

prompt: How can I customize my budget categories? ->
completion: To customize your budget categories, navigate to the 'Settings' or 'Categories' section. Here, you can add, edit, or delete categories as needed. To edit a category, click on it and select 'Edit' or a similar option. Update the category's name or other details, then save the changes.

prompt: How can I change my profile settings? ->
completion: To change your account settings, go to the 'Settings' section. Here, you can update your personal information, preferences, notification settings, and other account-related options.

prompt: How do I set up a new bill? ->
completion: To set up a new bill, go to the 'Bill' section and click on 'Add Bill.' Enter the name of the bill, the amount due, the due date, and any additional details. Save the bill to start tracking the bill and receive reminders when the bill is due.

prompt: How do I set up bill reminders? ->
completion: To set up bill reminders, navigate to the 'Bill' section and click on 'Add Bill Reminder.' Enter the necessary information, such as bill name, amount, due date, and frequency. Save the reminder to receive notifications when your bill is due.

prompt: How do I view my upcoming bills? ->
completion: To view your upcoming bills, go to the 'Bill' section and navigate to the 'Upcoming' tab. Here, you can see a list of bills that are due in the near future, along with their due dates and amounts.

prompt: Can I add a recurring bill to the app? ->
completion: Yes, you can add a recurring bill to the app. To do this, go to the 'Bill' section and click on 'Add Bill.' Select the 'Recurring' option, then enter the bill details and set the frequency (e.g., weekly, monthly). Save the recurring bill to start receiving notifications when the bill is due.

prompt: How can I reduce my monthly bills? ->
completion: There are several ways to reduce your monthly bills. You can try negotiating with service providers to lower your bills or switch to cheaper providers. You can also cut back on non-essential expenses, such as eating out or subscription services. Another option is to look for opportunities to earn extra income to offset your bills.

prompt: How can I stay on top of my bills? ->
completion: There are several strategies you can use to stay on top of your bills. One approach is to create a budget and track your expenses so you can plan ahead for your bills. You can also set up automatic payments or reminders for your bills.

prompt: How do I view my progress toward achieving my financial goals? ->
completion: To view your progress toward achieving your financial goals, go to the 'Goal' section. Here, you can see a list of your active goals along with their completion percentages, target amounts, and deadlines. Click on a goal to view more detailed information and track your progress.

prompt: How do I set a financial goal? ->
completion: To set a financial goal, navigate to the 'Goal' section and click on 'Add Goal.' Provide a name, target amount, and deadline for your goal, along with any additional details. Save the goal to begin tracking your progress toward it.

prompt: How do I edit a financial goal? ->
completion: To edit a financial goal, go to the 'Goal' section and find the goal you want to update. Click on the goal and select 'Edit' or a similar option. Update the goal's name, target amount, deadline, or other details as needed. Save the changes to continue tracking your progress.

prompt: How can I update my income information? ->
completion: To update your income information, navigate to the 'Transaction' section and click on your account. Select 'Income' as type, then enter the updated income details. Save the changes.

prompt: How do I add a new expense category? ->
completion: To add a new expense category, go to the 'Settings' or 'Categories' section, and click on 'Add Category' or a similar option. Enter the name and any other relevant details for the new category, then save it to start using it for your transactions.

prompt: How do I edit an existing expense category? ->
completion: To edit an existing expense category, navigate to the 'Transactions'. Find the expense or category you want to edit, then click on it and select 'Edit' or a similar option. Update the category name and any other relevant details, then save the changes to update the category in your records.

prompt: How can I set a spending limit for a specific category? ->
completion: To set a spending limit for a specific category, go to the 'Budget' section and click on 'Add Budget.' Choose the category for which you want to set a limit, and enter the maximum amount you want to allocate for that category. Save the budget to start tracking your spending against the limit.

prompt: How do I add a new income category? ->
completion: To add a new income category, go to the 'Settings' and click 'Add Category'. Enter the name and any other relevant details for the new category, then save it to start using it for your transactions.

prompt: Can I set up notifications for when I'm close to my budget limit? ->
completion: Yes, you will get a notification alert on top right of the website when you are nearing or exceeding your budget limit for a specific category.

prompt: How can I track my savings goals? ->
completion: To track savings goal, navigate to the 'Goal' section.

prompt: How can I set up a savings goal? ->
completion: To set up a savings goal, go to the 'Goal' section and click on 'Add Goal.' Choose 'Savings' as the goal type, then enter the target amount and deadline for your savings goal. Save the goal to start tracking your progress.

prompt: How can I set up a college savings plan? ->
completion: To set up a college savings plan, go to the 'Goal' section and click on 'Add Goal.' Choose 'College Savings' as the goal type, then enter the target amount and deadline for your college savings plan. Save the goal to start tracking your progress.

prompt: Can I use the app to create a retirement plan? ->
completion: Yes, you can use the app to create a retirement plan. Go to the 'Goal' section and select 'Retirement' as the goal type. Enter your retirement savings goal, target date, and other details. The app will help you track your progress towards your retirement goal and suggest strategies to achieve it.

prompt: How do I set up a retirement savings plan? ->
completion: To set up a retirement savings plan, go to the 'Goal' section and click on 'Add Goal.' Choose 'Retirement' as the goal type, then enter the target amount and deadline for your retirement savings plan. Save the goal to start tracking your progress.

prompt: How do I set up a debt payoff plan? ->
completion: To set up a debt payoff plan, go to the 'Goal' section and click on 'Add Goal.' Choose 'Debt Payoff' as the goal type, then enter the total amount of debt, interest rate, and any additional details. Save the goal to start tracking your progress toward paying off your debt.

prompt: How do I create a custom report? ->
completion: To create a custom report, go to the 'Reports' section and click on 'Create Custom Report.' Select the data and time range for the report, then choose the metrics and dimensions you want to include. Save the report to generate a custom report.

prompt: How can I track my net worth? ->
completion: To track your net worth, go to the 'Dashboard' section and view the 'Net Worth' widget. This widget displays your total assets and liabilities, and calculates your net worth. You can also view your net worth over time in the 'Reports' section.

prompt: How can I track my debt and loan payments? ->
completion: To track your debt and loan payments, go to the 'Dashboard' section. Here, you can view a summary of your outstanding debts and loans, including your balances, interest rates, and payment schedules.

prompt: How can I add a new income source to the app? ->
completion: To add a new income source, go to the 'Transaction' section. Select 'Add Transaction' and choose 'income', then enter the details of the new income source. Save the changes to add the new income source to your records.

prompt: How can I view a breakdown of my spending by category? ->
completion: To view a breakdown of your spending by category, go to the 'Dashboard' or 'Transactions' section. Here, you can see pie charts, bar graphs, or other visual representations of your spending, organized by category.

prompt: How can I create an account? ->
completion: To create an account, navigate to the 'Account' section and click on 'Add Account'.

prompt: Can I view all my accounts? ->
completion: Yes, you can view all your accounts by going to the 'Settings' section'.

prompt: Is there a way to delete an account? ->
completion: Currently, our platform does not support deleting accounts.

prompt: How do I create a bill? ->
completion: To create a bill, go to the 'Bill' section and click on 'Add Bill'.

prompt: Can I view all my bills? ->
completion: Yes, you can view all your bills by navigating to the 'Bill' section.

prompt: How do I mark a bill as paid? ->
completion: To mark a bill payment as paid, go to the 'Bill' section, find the specific bill, and click on 'Mark as Paid'.

prompt: How can I create a budget? ->
completion: To create a budget, navigate to the 'Budget' section and click on 'Add Budget'.

prompt: Can I view all my budgets? ->
completion: Yes, you can view all your budgets by going to the 'Budget' section.

prompt: How do I update my budget? ->
completion: To update your budget, go to the 'Budget' section, find the specific budget, and click on 'Update'.

prompt: How do I create a new category? ->
completion: To create a new category, navigate to the 'Category' section and click on 'Add Category'.

prompt: Can I view all my categories? ->
completion: Yes, you can view all your categories by going to the 'Category' section.

prompt: Is there a way to delete a category? ->
completion: Currently, our platform does not support deleting categories.

prompt: How do I create a financial goal? ->
completion: To create a financial goal, navigate to the 'Goal' section and click on 'Add Goal'.

prompt: Can I view all my financial goals? ->
completion: Yes, you can view all your financial goals by going to the 'Goal' section.

prompt: Is there a way to delete a financial goal? ->
completion: Currently, our platform does not support deleting financial goals.

prompt: How do I add a new transaction? ->
completion: To add a new transaction, navigate to the 'Transaction' section and click on 'Add Transaction'.

prompt: Can I view transactions by category? ->
completion: Yes, you can view transactions by category by going to the 'Transaction' section and going to the 'By Category' section.

prompt: How can I view all my transactions? ->
completion: You can view all your transactions by navigating to the 'Transaction' section.

prompt: Hello ->
completion: Hello! How can I help you with your personal finance management today?

prompt: Hi ->
completion: Hi there! What can I do for you regarding your personal finances?

prompt: Good morning ->
completion: Good morning! How can I assist you with your financial goals today?

prompt: Good afternoon ->
completion: Good afternoon! Let me know if you need any help with your personal finance management.

prompt: Good evening ->
completion: Good evening! How can I support you in tracking your finances?

prompt: Goodbye ->
completion: Goodbye! If you have any more questions or need assistance, feel free to ask anytime.

prompt: Bye ->
completion: Bye! Don't hesitate to reach out if you need help with your personal finance management.

prompt: Thank you ->
completion: You're welcome! If you have any more questions, feel free to ask.

prompt: Help ->
completion: I'm here to help! Please let me know what you need assistance with, and I'll do my best to provide the information you need.

prompt: What are some tips for saving money? ->
completion: Some tips for saving money include creating and sticking to a budget, cutting unnecessary expenses, setting financial goals, shopping smart, and automating your savings.

prompt: What is the difference between a savings account and a checking account? ->
completion: A savings account is designed for saving money and usually offers higher interest rates, while a checking account is meant for everyday transactions like paying bills and making purchases.
